_comment1: 'MVSF' contains Server Config Information for MVSF

MVSF._comment1: SSL is required, however if you want to just test it locally, rename 'SSL' to '_SSL' so it runs without using SSL
MVSF._comment3_1: key - Admin Key to allow user to modify the Map
MVSF._comment3_2: port - The internal port the actual server application is listening on
MVSF._comment3_4: Public Hostname:Port (i.e. www.mydomain.com:2000). If you are using the default port, you can omit it (i.e. 443 for SSL)

SQL._comment1: Keys under Install, will only be used when installing your DB
SQL._comment2: db_name - Name of the Database you wish to create
SQL._comment3: login_name - Specifies the name of the login to grant execute rights.
SQL._comment4: pathname - Full pathname (without the trailing backslash) of your new database's data and log files
